resources.string:
---Welcome to Mappin---
This is an Android app combining the information from Google and Facebook to provide you with the best route to travel between places.
*Search Route*
Start searching routes, please RETRIEVE EVENTS before searching to optimise the route results.
*Report Traffic*
Report any road incidents.
*Retrieve Events*
Retrieve live traffic incidents from Facebook traffic groups.
*Facebook Login*
Please login to Facebook to be able to retrieve events successfully.

*GPS*
Click on the GPS button at the top right hand corner of the map to generate a more accurate departure address.
*From textbox*
Fill in address either by clicking on the GPS button or typing in manually.
*To textbox*
Fill in address either by clicking on the map or typing in manually.
*GO!*
Start route searching, the app will return you with a few suggested routes on a new page.

*GPS*
Start location update, the map will keep updating and zoom into your current location.
*stop*
Stop location update, the map will stop location update and stop moving.
*Route colours*
The route colours ranked as blue-green-orange-red, blue being the best and red being the worst.
Dark colour for BUS.
Light colour for WALKING.
*Route-Instructions*
Click on a route to generate a scrollable list of information about the route with estimated travel time, walking distance, bus arrival time, bus number, etc.
*Report Traffic*
Go to report traffic page.

*GPS*
Start location update, the map will keep updating and zoom into your current location.
*Location textbox*
Click on the map to generate a report location or type in manually.
*REPORT!*
Enters report writing page to give more detail about the incident.

*Address text*
The latitude, longitude and the address of the location you want to report incident.
*Description textbox*
Enter more detail about the incident you want to report.
*Submit*
Submit the reported incident onto Facebook traffic group, it will be posted onto the wall after being approved by admins.
